none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on October 23, 2014 Description from Terminal Escape:
Dark, sparse industrial drones. SECAM KINO excel when they inject beats into the mix ("Full Tab," "New Doctrines"), but perhaps it's the anxiety of waiting that makes those rhythms so enchanting. Extreme patience required for maximum effect, you need to let these sounds guide you....they already have a destination in mind. DILETTANTE RECITAL
//3.bp.blogspot.com/-bbt4pWfHyWg/VEkOK6TjrAI/AAAAAAAALA4/uk9U6GvuWAI/s1600/secam%2Bkino%2Bcover.jpg

seo.title: Secam Kino - Dilettante Recital - Terminal Escape
